wikipedia_page.main: Stuart Bernard Redfern (born  (1961-06-16) 16 June 1961 in Leicester) is an English rugby union footballer who played in the 1980s, and 1990s. He played representative level rugby union (RU) for England, and a club level for Leicester Tigers, as a loosehead prop. He retired from Leicester in 1992. He was later a member of the Tigers' coaching team and coach of Coalville RFC.  His older brother is Steve Redfern.
